name: Yuugi and the Jailbreak King
description:
A simple sokoban-style game I made for the touhou jam 9. Play as Mizuchi, and possess Yuugi to get to the ladder at the end of each level!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys: Move/push

Left click/Z: Possess

R/X: Restart

Official touhou games can be found on steam:

Touhou 18:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566410/Touhou_Kouryudou__Unconnected_Markete...

Touhou 17:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1079160/Touhou_Kikeijuu__Wily_Beast_and_Weake...

Touhou 16:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/745880/Touhou_Tenkuushou__Hidden_Star_in_Four...

Unmodified character sprites made by Pixel Pete who can be found here:

https://www.youtube.com/c/PeterMilko
